name: Promet-ERP
tagline: Promet is an management system for nearly any type of data you or your company needs.
body:
Promet-ERP
==========

Promet is an management system.

Functions
* Contactmanagement
* Ordermanagement
* Projectmanagement
* Storage and Resource Planning
* Online Banking
* Document Managemnent

Development
===========

Needs actual Lazarus Version > 1.2.2
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
